alert.note: Alert for Russell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 1:19PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN RUSSELL COUNTY THROUGH 1245 PM CDT... At 1218 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Jamestown, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jabez, Ono, Vinnie, Eli, Whittle and Fonthill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
